plot: Traces a week in the lives of a young married couple, both mentally handicapped. Looks at how they approach solving their problems and how they cope with life as members of the community.
title: Winning
plot_es: Traces a week in the lives of a young married couple, both mentally handicapped. Looks at how they approach solving their problems and how they cope with life as members of the community.
